title: Mundo del Amor
description: One-eyed orphan, Alejandro, is thrown out of the orphanage for being different. Rejected by all, Alejandro lives alone on the streets. Until one day, he becomes a man and Tijuanaâ€™s greatest lover.
altHero: Alejandro, a handsome man with mustache and eye patch, stands on a balcony in a bathrobe
alt1: a nun wearing sunglasses surrounded by some bully kids
alt2: a young Alejandro cries outside the church
alt3: adult Alejandro sits by a red telephone and is surrounded by piles of cash
alt4: Alejandro drives a purple sports car with a tiger in the front seat; he has a rose in his teeth
